title: Auxiliary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Assist someone at night. You grant them Roleblock, Redirect, Control, Conversion, Detection, Modification, and Suppression Immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune.
- You can self target. Don't know why you would do that but you can.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
**Modification Immunity:** Your role card cannot be modified negatively.
**Suppression Immunity:** If you die, your role, will, and cause of death will always flip correctly.

desc:
Post 2650
*fuck off ralsei, I have MORE immunities*
